amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-783 to limit the application of the bill to only sea lions, rather than all pinnipeds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Kilmer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
